Medical Web Design Agency

Book more patients.

Tired of your underperforming medical website? It’s time to turn your visitors into patients.

Partners First

Home – Website Design Agency – Medical Web Design Agency

Do you have a slow and difficult-to-manage website?

The sad truth is that all websites are not created equal.

 

When done wrong, you’ll struggle with a slow, unscalable mess.

 

However, if done right, you’ll have an easy-to-use, infinitely scalable marketing tool.

 

You need an agency partner that understands how to build a website that will empower your business, rather than get in the way of it.

Trusted By

Here To Help

Three ways we help medical companies succeed

Creating The Right Strategy

In order for your marketing to succeed-you need the right foundation.

 

Understanding your current customers will be the key to gaining new ones.

 

You need a partner that can quickly understand your business and what motivates your patients.

Book A Strategy Session

“Our patient applications almost instantly doubled after the launch of the new website.”

Colin Studwell, Chief Operating Officer at AB Health

Easy editing equips your business

Your business moves fast. New initiatives arise. Opportunities need to be capitalized on.

 

Updating your website shouldn’t get in the way of that.

 

You need a website that is easy to manage without a computer science degree.

Book A Strategy Session

“Jorbanis incredibly creative in everything they do. They were able to come up with a solution for every problem we had.”

Jari Greenbaum, Vice President of Marketing at Centivo

Security you can count on

It’s true, websites can have security issues…

 

If they’re built poorly, use unreliable third-party plug-ins, or are not maintained routinely.

 

You need a partner that limits the use of plug-ins, only works with reputable third-party plug-in developers when necessary, and understands how to avoid vulnerabilities.

Book A Strategy Session

There is an online hacker attack every 39 seconds. In the past 12 years, we’ve never had a website compromised.

FAQS

Let’s get into the details

What does a medical website cost?

 

Our average medical website re-build averages $75,000-$150,000. This is a one-time, fixed-fee cost that includes:

  • Digital Strategy
  • UI/UX Design
  • Full-Stack Web Development
  • Copywriting
  • Graphic + Asset Creation
  • Data Entry + Migration
  • Technical SEO Optimization
  • Analytics + Goal Setup
  • UI/UX Guidelines
  • Editors Guidelines
  • Full Ownership of Design + Development
  • Upon Completion
  • 2 Weeks Post-Launch Support

If you’re curious about what your project may cost, check out our project calculator.

What types of companies do you work with?

 

Our typical customer is a mid-market business making $25-$250m / year.

We most often work in the following industries:

  • Construction
  • Education
  • FinTech
  • Healthcare
  • Professional Services
  • Retail + Consumer Goods
  • SaaS

How long does it take to build a medical website?

 

From start to finish, our average full medical website re-build takes 6 months to complete.

What results should I expect?

 

Results will vary based on specific goals and your industry.

However, on average, our websites…

  • Are effective for 56% longer
  • Convert 82% better
  • Create a 24% lift in organic search results

Do you offer support after the medical website has launched?

 

Yes!

We have a dedicated support team in-house that can handle anything from routine support updates to full-feature launches for existing medical websites.

FAQS

Top Medical Website Agency Questions We’re Asked

How much does a medical website agency cost?

 

The cost to build a website can vary greatly depending on the complexity of the software, the features and functionality required, the level of customization, and the experience of the development team. A basic website could cost anywhere from $25,000 to $75,000, while a more complex and feature-rich platform could cost upwards of $200,000 or more.

It is important to work with a reputable and experienced development team that can provide a detailed proposal outlining the project, the scope of work and associated costs. It is also important to consider ongoing maintenance and support costs and any additional fees for hosting and infrastructure.

Overall, the cost to build a website should be viewed as an investment in the business’s long-term success.

Our average SaaS website rebuild averages $75,000-$150,000. This is a one-time, fixed fee cost that includes:

  • Digital Strategy
  • UI/UX Design
  • Full-Stack Web Development
  • Copywriting
  • Graphic + Asset Creation
  • Data Entry + Migration
  • Technical SEO Optimization
  • Analytics + Goal Setup
  • UI/UX Guidelines

  • Upon Completion
  • 2 Weeks Post-Launch Support

If you’re curious about your project’s cost, check out our project calculator.

Our typical customer is a mid-market business making $25-$250m / year.

We most often work in the following industries:

  • Construction
  • Education
  • FinTech
  • Healthcare
  • Professional Services
  • Retail + Consumer Goods
  • SaaS

How long does it take to build a Medical website?

 

The timeline for completing a project depends on several factors such as the complexity of the new website itself, the scope of work required, and how quickly you are able to provide feedback throughout the discovery phase of the process. Typically, projects can range from 4-8 months or longer if there are complex features or integrations needed.

What results should I expect?

 

Results will vary based on specific goals and your industry.

However, on average, our websites…

  • Create a 24% lift in organic search results

Yes!

For The Extra Curious

What factors should be considered when selecting a medical web design company

 

Did you know there are over 6,909 web design firms specializing in healthcare websites?

Navigating the digital landscape can be challenging for any business, but particularly so within the highly competitive healthcare industry.

This article aims to demystify what a medical web design agency does and highlight its importance in digital transformation, increasing patient engagement and enhancing user experience.

Stick around if you’re keen on optimizing your online presence!

 

 

What are the key takeaways when choosing a medical website design?

 

Key Takeaways

  • A Medical Web Design Agency specializes in creating and maintaining professional, user-friendly websites for healthcare professionals and organizations, with services including custom website design, ADA compliance web design, database integration, and e-commerce functionality.
  • Working with a medical web design agency enhances professionalism and credibility for healthcare businesses by providing a customized site that reflects their brand identity and adheres to industry best practices. It also ensures HIPAA compliance for handling sensitive patient information, fostering trust among patients.
  • A proficient medical web design agency prioritizes user experience (UX) through strategic design elements such as branded colors, clear call-to-action buttons, and simplified navigation. This results in improved search rankings, increased traffic to the website, and higher conversions.
  • Increased patient engagement is a key benefit of partnering with a medical web design agency. By offering features such as easy appointment scheduling systems, informative blog articles on relevant health topics, interactive tools like symptom checkers or treatment cost estimators, and secure patient portals for accessing personal health records or communicating with healthcare providers, potential patients are more likely to schedule appointments, follow through with treatment plans, and recommend your practice to others.

What is a Medical Web Design Agency and how does it specialize in creating user-friendly websites for healthcare while considering industry-specific needs?

 

A Medical Web Design Agency is a specific type of digital agency that specializes in creating and maintaining professional, user-friendly websites for healthcare professionals and healthcare organizations.

Their expertise lies not only in the technical aspects of website development but also in understanding the unique needs and compliance standards of the healthcare industry. These agencies offer a range of services to medical professionals, including Custom Website Design, ADA Compliance Web Design Services, Database Integration, and E-commerce Functionality.

Harnessing advanced UI/UX design techniques along with precision-targeted SEO strategies ensures improved site traffic, higher search rankings and increased patient engagement for medical practices.

A remarkable fact to note is that out of 6,909 web design firms globally specializing in healthcare sites, each has particular strength areas varying from branding to content management system SEO optimization. In contrast, some specialize up to 90% on web-only design projects.

This highlights the multitude of other services offered by such healthcare web design companies, which can be instrumental to drive business growth in the ever-evolving digital landscape.

Why is a Medical Web Design Agency important for healthcare professionals and organizations?

 

A medical web design agency is crucial for healthcare businesses as it ensures professionalism, credibility, enhanced user experience, and increased patient engagement.

 

Professionalism And Credibility

In the booming healthcare business, professionalism and credibility are game changers. Introducing a custom site designed by a top-notch medical web design company can significantly elevate the perception of your brand.

It’s not just about aesthetics; it’s about providing a user-friendly patient portal adorned with branded colors, clear call-to-action buttons, and vital resources that resonate with potential patients.

Investing in web design rankings will increase conversions, boost search rankings and ultimately improve ROI.

Furthermore, partnering with healthcare-compliant digital advertising agencies like Jorbanensures that your website is HIPAA-compliant – a must-have feature for any healthcare system handling sensitive patient information.

Not only does this protect you legally, but it also helps foster trust among patients who recognize such compliance as an indication of your dedication to their privacy and care. Remember, having an attractive site isn’t enough; earning patient choice requires diligent attention to detail and adhering to industry best practices.

 

Enhanced User Experience

As a marketing manager in the healthcare industry, enhancing user experience for your website visitors is crucial. It can positively impact conversions and search rankings. A proficient medical web design agency will prioritize User Experience (UX), creating an interface that’s easy to navigate and visually compelling.

This could involve anything from strategically using branded colours and white space to optimizing on-page elements for speed and simplicity. In a saturated market with 6,909 web design firms specializing in healthcare websites, top-notch UX becomes a distinguishing factor.

It doesn’t just improve the overall look of your site; it simplifies navigation for potential patients, making information easily accessible and encouraging interactions through well-placed call-to-action buttons or patient portals.

Invest in this aspect of digital marketing and digital strategy as part of ROI improvement measures because better user experience equals better business growth.

 

Increased Patient Engagement

Increased patient engagement is a key benefit of working with a medical web design agency. By creating a user-friendly and visually appealing website, you can capture the attention of potential patients and keep them engaged throughout their online journey.

Studies have shown that engaged patients are more likely to schedule appointments, follow through with treatment plans, and recommend their practice to others.

With the help of a medical web design agency, you can implement various features that enhance patient engagement. These digital experiences may include easy-to-use appointment scheduling systems, informative blog articles on relevant health topics, interactive tools such as symptom checkers or treatment cost estimators, and secure patient portals for accessing personal health records or communicating with healthcare providers.

By prioritizing patient engagement on your website, you not only provide valuable resources for individuals seeking medical information but also establish yourself as a trusted healthcare resource in the industry.

What Does A Medical Web Design Agency Do?

 

A medical web design agency offers various services, including custom website design, full web development, ADA compliance web design, medical website redesign, and 30-day medical website design services. Curious to learn more about how these services can benefit your business and grow your healthcare practice? Keep reading!

 

Custom Website Design

A key service offered by medical web design agencies is custom website design. With over 6,909 specialized firms in the medical industry alone, it’s crucial to stand out and provide a unique online presence.

Custom website design allows healthcare businesses to create a visually appealing and user-friendly site that reflects their brand identity and values. This tailored approach helps capture the attention of potential patients and differentiates them from competitors.

Studies have shown that an attractive site can increase traffic, improve user engagement, and lead to higher conversions and revenue growth. Investing in professional web design services ensures that your healthcare clinic or practice has a well-designed website that not only looks great but also delivers optimal performance.

 

ADA Compliance Web Design Services

Medical web design agencies offer ADA compliance web design services to ensure that medical websites are accessible to all users, including those with disabilities. Here are some key points regarding ADA compliance web design services:

  1. ADA Standards: Medical web design agencies are well-versed in the Americans with Disabilities Act (ADA) standards for web accessibility. They ensure that websites meet these standards, making them accessible to individuals with visual impairments, hearing impairments, motor disabilities, and cognitive disabilities.
  2. Assistive Technologies: Medical web design agencies implement features that allow assistive technologies like screen readers and voice recognition software to properly navigate and interact with the website. This ensures that individuals with disabilities can access the website’s information and functionalities effectively.
  3. Alternative Text: Medical web design agencies include alternative text descriptions for images on medical websites. This allows individuals using screen readers or braille displays to understand the content of the image, contributing to a more inclusive user experience.
  4. Keyboard Navigation: ADA compliance web design services focus on providing keyboard navigation options for individuals who cannot use a mouse or touchscreen device due to physical limitations. This feature enables easy navigation of medical websites using only keyboard inputs.
  5. Color Contrast: Medical web design agencies consider color contrast when designing websites, ensuring text is easily readable by individuals with visual impairments or color blindness.
  6. Video and Audio Accessibility: Medical web design agencies optimize videos and audio content on medical websites so that they are accessible through captions, transcripts, and other assistive technologies.
  7. Forms and Interactive Elements: ADA compliance web design services take into account accessibility features for forms and interactive elements on medical websites so that individuals with disabilities can complete tasks independently.
  8. Testing and Compliance Audits: As part of their ADA compliance web design services, medical web design agencies conduct thorough testing and compliance audits to identify any accessibility issues and ensure full adherence to ADA guidelines.
  9. Ongoing Maintenance: To maintain accessibility standards, medical web design agencies provide ongoing maintenance and updates to keep websites compliant with evolving accessibility guidelines.
  10. Legal Compliance: ADA compliance web design services help medical websites stay compliant with legal requirements, reducing the risk of potential lawsuits related to accessibility issues.

 

Medical Website Redesign Services

Medical website redesign services are essential for healthcare businesses looking to improve their online presence and attract more patients. These new websites and services involve revamping an existing medical website to make it more visually appealing, user-friendly, and technologically advanced.

By working with a reputable web design agency specializing in healthcare websites, marketing managers can ensure that their medical website is optimized for conversions, search engine rankings, and patient engagement.

With the ever-changing digital landscape in the healthcare industry, it’s crucial for marketing managers to prioritize regular website updates and redesigns to stay competitive. Whether optimizing page load times or incorporating mobile-friendly features, medical website redesign services can help boost your online visibility and drive more revenue for your business.

 

What are the recommended best practices for medical web design?

 

When it comes to medical web design, there are several best practices that can help ensure your website is user-friendly, mobile-optimized, and compliant with ADA and HIPAA regulations.

 

User-friendly Design

A user-friendly design is a crucial element of a medical website. Visitors can easily navigate through the site, find the information they need, and take action. Studies show that 88% of online consumers are less likely to return to a website after a bad experience.

For marketing managers, this means potential patients may be lost due to frustrating navigation or complicated forms. By implementing a user-friendly design, you can enhance the overall user experience and increase conversions on your website.

According to research, websites with better usability have an average conversion rate of 14%. Additionally, mobile-friendly sites generate more traffic and have higher search rankings as Google prioritizes mobile optimization in its algorithm updates.

 

Mobile Optimization

One crucial aspect of medical web design is mobile optimization. In today’s digital world, more and more people are accessing websites through their smartphones and tablets. As a marketing manager, it is vital to ensure that your medical website is responsive and user-friendly on all devices.

Mobile optimization enhances the user experience and helps improve search engine rankings. Studies show that 60% of Americans use their mobile devices as their primary method of accessing the internet.

Moreover, Google prioritizes mobile-friendly websites in its search results, meaning having a mobile-optimized site can significantly impact your online visibility and attract potential patients.

 

SEO Integration

SEO integration is a crucial component of medical web design. By incorporating search engine optimization techniques, your website can achieve higher visibility in search engine rankings, attracting more potential patients to your practice.

The top healthcare web design companies understand the importance of optimizing websites for relevant keywords and implementing effective SEO strategies. They have expertise in conducting keyword research, optimizing meta tags and descriptions, creating high-quality content, and building authoritative backlinks.

With SEO integration, you can improve your website’s organic search rankings and drive targeted traffic to increase patient acquisition and conversions.

 

Easy Navigation

Easy navigation is a crucial aspect of medical web design and development that should not be underestimated. When visitors come to a healthcare website, they want to quickly and effortlessly find the information they need.

A cluttered or confusing layout can lead to frustration and potential patients leaving the site altogether. Studies have shown that users spend an average of 5.94 seconds looking at a website’s main menu before deciding whether to stay or go.

That’s why it’s important for medical web design agencies to prioritize clear navigation menus, intuitive page hierarchy, and strategically placed call-to-action buttons. By ensuring ease of navigation, healthcare websites can provide a seamless user experience, leading to increased engagement and higher conversion rates.

 

ADA Compliance

ADA compliance is a crucial aspect of medical web design. It ensures that websites are accessible to all individuals, including those with disabilities. This not only aligns medical device companies with legal requirements but also demonstrates a commitment to inclusivity and patient-centred care.

ADA compliance involves implementing features such as alt text for images, keyboard navigation options, clear and readable fonts, and proper headings for screen readers. By prioritizing ADA compliance in your website design, you can create an inclusive online experience for all users and enhance the reputation and credibility of your medical practice or healthcare organization.

 

HIPPA Compliance

HIPAA compliance is a critical aspect of medical web design agencies. It ensures that patient information is protected and secure. With the increasing prevalence of data breaches, it’s essential for healthcare websites to adhere to HIPAA regulations to maintain patient confidentiality and trust.

This includes implementing strong security measures, encrypting sensitive data, conducting regular risk assessments, and providing proper training on privacy practices. By partnering with a medical web design agency or development firm that understands HIPAA compliance requirements, marketing managers can ensure their website meets all necessary standards and safeguards patient information effectively.

How can you plan the future of your WordPress website effectively?

 

Building a successful website involves much more than pretty design. To meet and exceed expectations, you need to incorporate amazing customer experiences, online marketing strategies, and technology trends. That’s why many companies and site owners turn to us when they need a WordPress web redesign.

Our wealth of experience in WordPress websites allows us to anticipate future trends and future-proof your site so it stays relevant longer.

What tips should be considered when selecting a medical web design agency?  

 

Choosing the right medical web design agency is crucial for the success of your healthcare business. Discover how to find a reputable healthcare web design agency that understands your industry and provides tailored solutions for your healthcare website design needs.

Learn more about what to look for in a medical web design agency and make an informed decision today.

Reputation And Reviews

Reputation and reviews play a crucial role in choosing the right medical web design agency. When selecting an agency, it’s important to consider its track record and what previous clients have to say about them.

The top healthcare web design companies have been reviewed and ranked based on their performance, giving you valuable insights into their reputation. These reviews provide real-life experiences from clients who have worked with these agencies, helping you gauge their expertise, professionalism, and overall satisfaction.

By paying attention to reputation and reviews, marketing managers can make informed decisions when selecting a medical web design agency that will deliver exceptional results for their healthcare business.

Portfolio Of Previous Work

A strong portfolio of previous work is an essential factor to consider when choosing a medical web design agency. It provides tangible evidence of their expertise and ability to deliver results.

By assessing the agency’s past projects, you can gauge their creative skills, attention to detail, and overall design aesthetic. Look for examples of websites they have designed for other healthcare clients and evaluate if those designs align with your goals and target audience.

Additionally, take note of any innovative features or functionalities they have implemented in their previous work. A diverse portfolio best websites that showcases versatility in catering to different industries also indicates the agency’s adaptability and experience in creating successful websites across various sectors.

Understanding Of Healthcare Industry

A crucial factor to consider when choosing a medical web design agency is their understanding of the healthcare industry. A deep knowledge and comprehension of the unique challenges, regulations, and patient expectations within the healthcare sector can greatly enhance the effectiveness of a healthcare website design.

This includes having an awareness of HIPAA compliance requirements for handling sensitive patient information, designing user-friendly interfaces that cater to patients’ needs, and implementing strategies that improve online visibility in search engine results.

By partnering with a web design agency that understands the intricacies of the healthcare industry, marketing managers can ensure that their website not only looks visually appealing but also meets all necessary standards while effectively reaching their target audience.

Range Of Services

The range of custom software and web development services offered by medical web design agencies is extensive and tailored to meet the unique needs of healthcare businesses. These agencies provide everything from custom website design to ADA compliance web design services, ensuring that your website not only looks great but also meets all legal requirements.

They also offer medical website redesign services for those looking to update their existing websites. Additionally, many agencies provide 30-day medical website design services, delivering a fully functional and visually appealing site in a short period of time.

With expertise in SEO integration, mobile optimization, easy navigation, ADA compliance, and HIPAA compliance, these agencies are equipped to create user-friendly websites and marketing services that enhance patient engagement and drive conversions.

How Do I Start A Medical Website?

 

Starting a medical website can be a daunting task, especially if you’re new to the field. But don’t worry. We’ve got you covered! Here are some steps you can take to start your own medical website:

  1. Research and define your target audience: Before diving into the website creation process, it’s important to identify who your website is targeting. Are you focusing on patients, healthcare professionals, or both? Understanding your audience will guide the design and content of your site.
  2. Choose a domain name: Your domain name should reflect your brand and make it easy for users to find and remember your website. Consider using relevant keywords in your domain name to improve search engine visibility.
  3. Select a reliable web hosting provider: Look for a web hosting provider that specializes in healthcare websites and offers features like HIPAA compliance and data security.
  4. Plan out the structure and design of your site: Create a sitemap that outlines the different sections and pages of your website. Consider including pages such as “About Us,” “Services,” “Contact,” and any specific information or resources related to your medical practice.
  5. Hire a professional web design agency: To ensure that your website looks polished and functions seamlessly, consider partnering with a medical web design agency like WebFX. They have extensive experience in creating custom medical websites that are user-friendly, mobile-responsive, and optimized for search engines.
  6. Develop engaging content: High-quality content is crucial for attracting visitors and providing value to them. Focus on creating informative articles, blog posts, videos, or infographics that address common questions or concerns within the healthcare industry.
  7. Optimize for search engines: Implementing proper SEO strategies from the beginning will help increase organic traffic to your site. This includes incorporating relevant keywords into page titles, meta descriptions, headings, and throughout your content.
  8. Test, launch, and maintain: Before launching your website, thoroughly test its functionality and usability across different devices and browsers. Once live, regularly monitor and update your site to ensure it stays secure, user-friendly, and up-to-date with the latest industry trends.
